# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the gazetteer.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a gazetteer

- **model**: The gazetteer contained within a Core ML model file stored in memory.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the gazetteer that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the gazetteer shown in a playground.
